class.desc: A node of the parsing stack for SimpleReader parser modules.

constant.name: STATE_FIRST_STEP
constant.desc: The state meaning that the first step has occured.

constant.name: STATE_MIDDLE
constant.desc: The state meaning that node is in the middle state.

constant.name: STATE_AT_END
constant.desc: The state meaning the node is at the end, and can go no further.

var.name: state
var.desc: The parsing state the node is in.

var.name: decoration
var.desc: Tells if the node is the decoration of the stack, meaning its not a normal node. This is at the top of stack. There is zero, one, but not more.
